entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
